name: TivaWare for TM4C SDK
description:
Texas Instruments' TM4C12x MCUs offer the industry’s popular ARM® Cortex®-M4F core with scalable memory and package options, a wide array of wired connectivity peripherals, advanced application functions, high performance analog integration, and extensive software solutions. In addition, Texas Instruments offers a complete solution to get to market quickly, with evaluation and development boards, white papers, application notes, an easy-to-use peripheral driver library, and a strong support, sales, and distributor network.


LaunchPad, BoosterPack, and TivaWare are trademarks of Texas Instruments.
ARM and Cortex are registered trademarks of ARM Limited.
microSD is a registered trademark of SD-3C, LLC.
OLED is a registered trademark of LG Electronics Inc. Corporation.
All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
